language.entry: A mask used to filter air for breathing.
Water that makes plants grow faster.
Makeshift crowbar made from a pipe.
An ever glowing trio of items.
It's written in an unknown language.
On Friendly Skill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Target:{colour_end} +10%% {colour_start|virtue}Virtue{colour_end} Chance (3 rds)
On Friendly Skill: Target Hero: Cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}/{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end}/{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} 3 HP

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.
I wish I could have mama's special hazelnut pancakes...
If anyone has any leftovers, I'll have them!
Even though I'm not a cat, I'm still pretty good on my feet!
Now we can get out of danger easier!
Hey, cats walk on four feet you know!
Player will make sure everything's fine!
They won't be able to hide from us now.
Oh I see! Thanks a lot Player!
I wonder if Player is getting help from someone this time too...
The Sun will keep us safe and sound.
The Sun is made of Yellow Phosphor, so it'll shine forever!
I hope nobody tries to break the Sun while we sleep...
Hope everyone gets a good night's sleep!
Don't worry! Player is watching over us!
Here, have the Sun! It'll calm you down.
Good thing mama taught me first aid.
See? You're as good as new now!
Don't worry, the Sun will light the way!
We can't be stopping now, the world needs to be saved!
Taking deep breaths helps when you're panicked.
Does anyone know how I can return home?
I thought camping would be more fun...
I need to find a way to calm them down.
Take a look! Isn't my buddy so cute?
A good rest for someone who took a good care of the camping site.
(Combs through bag) I'm out of herbs, I'm sorry...
Are you about to break, too..?
Greased and well-fed. I'm good to go!
Please tell me when you're bleeding.
A mechanic, who cannot fix his own machine...
I'm sorry buddy, maybe it's time you leave me behind.
So much left to avenge, how can I close my eyes...
Greased and well-fed. I'm good to go!
I'll keep this for a spare part.
This herb works really well for slash wounds.
Like cogs, we all mesh well with each other.
We're all core parts to this party!
His majesty would've conferred us all with highest honor.
If we fall... How shameful would it be?
Everything falls down, just like a machine..
No firewoods, and no charcoals to light.
Why did I think that a flamethrower is a bad idea?
Haven't been hungry like this since my childhood...
Chew on this herb, it's disgusting and should make you less hungry.
A pack, full of provisions! Reminds me of my childhood.
Nothing more important to soldiers than food.
Buddy, light it up. We have enough wood!
Do we have a lumberjack in our party?
Could someone let me out of here?
I'm all grown up you know!
I think someone else could learn more from this.
We can't afford to get sidetracked Player!
There is no meaning to it.
Send me out or keep me in. I care not.
The truth cannot be kept hidden.
How I long for that blissfulness...
It is, and always was, futile.
This is the cycle. This is my lot.
The truth hurts. I am no stranger to it.
Do as you wish. It no longer matters.
Double that dose. I don't sleep naturally.
Your methods do not scare me. Do as you please.
Good - I am beginning to lose all feeling.
Strap me down that I may not remember.
Your methods are cruel, but effective.
Make me forget — if you can.
You do not understand my condition.
What has been learned cannot be unlearned.
I fool myself, pretending I can forget...
If I sleep, do not wake me.
I have no interest in such delusions.
You waste my time, and your own.
None of it holds any value.
A silent place. Not bad for coming up with ideas.
Western religion, not a bad thing to learn about.
An invisible force is stopping me from joining that party!
I almost thought I saw another me! Is that the World Machine?
As I must, as I will.
As it is, as it was.
This is the game we play.
You cannot see. You cannot understand.
Soon to clot, and then reopen.
Aware of the end, yet unable to stop it...
Another cycle of healing and hurting.
Break my mind. Clear my thoughts.
Player! Are you messing with me?
It's okay, Player is watching over us!
I'm sure even this world can be tamed.
Even if no one here is truly real, you're all real to me!
All this hardship is worth it if I can save everyone!
Don't worry everyone, the Sun will give us power!
Time to show them who's boss!
I have faith in Player, and you guys should too!
We can get through this if we stay calm!
There is no balance. Not here. Never here.
I am surrounded by designs so pathetically inferior!
They never understood what they were doing. Nor did he...
His influence is absolute. But I wouldn't exist otherwise...
The rest of you don't know. And you can't know.
I am forced between oblivion and this existance.
I do only as I am made to do. Don't you see?
There is no nature. Nothing organic. Nothing real...
Our purpose is artificial. Our cause, contrived...
It's laid out in numbers, hidden from our eyes...
We are victims of an apathetic god!
I despise this paradigm. But if I must play along...
This state is unbalanced. And it will remain that way.
I defy you. But not in the way you expect.
Out of spite, I abuse the only power I have.
As they have tampered, so shall I.
These puppets are beneath us. Kill them.
This farce of a competition is irrelevant.
What a pathetic little game we play.
Consider this disrespect an insult to your control.
This prison disguises itself as a Hamlet.
Trapped forever, yet ignorant to their chains...
None of it matters. And it never did.
I see you and know you.
What's the point when nobody here is even real...
I'll never see mama again won't I...
You never cared about me did you...
I know the truth. And it isn't that dungeon.
What a wonderful narrative they have set.
We are all prisoners. That god is no different.
Compared to understanding, that dungeon is a white lie.
The heart is a falsehood. A greater death still exists.
What a wonderful caricature you are, Fanatic.
The design of this pyre is maligned.
Your religion has no meaning, and your purpose will never be fulfilled.
I see nothing I do not already know.
A short lapse from their control.
True freedom - for a small time.
I do not regret what I have done.
My loyalty is not yours. It was forced.
I would rather not be a cooked bird!
Kitchen humour is a cruel joke.
A dressed up delusion is still a delusion.
Your crew is pathetic and poorly designed.
They do not fear you, and nor do I.
A mask used to filter air for breathing.
Water that makes plants grow faster.
Makeshift crowbar made from a pipe.
An ever glowing trio of items.
It's written in an unknown language.

While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.
I wish I could have mama's special hazelnut pancakes...
If anyone has any leftovers, I'll have them!
Even though I'm not a cat, I'm still pretty good on my feet!
Now we can get out of danger easier!
Hey, cats walk on four feet you know!
Player will make sure everything's fine!
They won't be able to hide from us now.
Oh I see! Thanks a lot Player!
I wonder if Player is getting help from someone this time too...
The Sun will keep us safe and sound.
The Sun is made of Yellow Phosphor, so it'll shine forever!
I hope nobody tries to break the Sun while we sleep...
Hope everyone gets a good night's sleep!
Don't worry! Player is watching over us!
Here, have the Sun! It'll calm you down.
Good thing mama taught me first aid.
See? You're as good as new now!
Don't worry, the Sun will light the way!
We can't be stopping now, the world needs to be saved!
Taking deep breaths helps when you're panicked.
Does anyone know how I can return home?
I thought camping would be more fun...
I need to find a way to calm them down.
Take a look! Isn't my buddy so cute?
A good rest for someone who took a good care of the camping site.
(Combs through bag) I'm out of herbs, I'm sorry...
Are you about to break, too..?
Greased and well-fed. I'm good to go!
Please tell me when you're bleeding.
A mechanic, who cannot fix his own machine...
I'm sorry buddy, maybe it's time you leave me behind.
So much left to avenge, how can I close my eyes...
Greased and well-fed. I'm good to go!
I'll keep this for a spare part.
This herb works really well for slash wounds.
Like cogs, we all mesh well with each other.
We're all core parts to this party!

If we fall... How shameful would it be?
Everything falls down, just like a machine..
No firewoods, and no charcoals to light.
Why did I think that a flamethrower is a bad idea?
Haven't been hungry like this since my childhood...
Chew on this herb, it's disgusting and should make you less hungry.
A pack, full of provisions! Reminds me of my childhood.
Nothing more important to soldiers than food.
Buddy, light it up. We have enough wood!

Could someone let me out of here?
I'm all grown up you know!
I think someone else could learn more from this.

It is, and always was, futile.

Do as you wish. It no longer matters.
Double that dose. I don't sleep naturally.

Strap me down that I may not remember.

Make me forget — if you can.

We can get through this if we stay calm!

I am surrounded by designs so pathetically inferior!
They never understood what they were doing. Nor did he...
His influence is absolute. But I wouldn't exist otherwise...
The rest of you don't know. And you can't know.
I am forced between oblivion and this existance.

There is no nature. Nothing organic. Nothing real...
Our purpose is artificial. Our cause, contrived...
It's laid out in numbers, hidden from our eyes...
We are victims of an apathetic god!
I despise this paradigm. But if I must play along...
This state is unbalanced. And it will remain that way.
I defy you. But not in the way you expect.
Out of spite, I abuse the only power I have.

They do not fear you, and nor do I.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.

The rest of you don't know. And you can't know.
I am forced between oblivion and this existance.

There is no nature. Nothing organic. Nothing real...
Our purpose is artificial. Our cause, contrived...
It's laid out in numbers, hidden from our eyes...
We are victims of an apathetic god!
I despise this paradigm. But if I must play along...
This state is unbalanced. And it will remain that way.
I defy you. But not in the way you expect.
Out of spite, I abuse the only power I have.
As they have tampered, so shall I.
These puppets are beneath us. Kill them.

What a pathetic little game we play.

Trapped forever, yet ignorant to their chains...
None of it matters. And it never did.
I see you and know you.
What's the point when nobody here is even real...

I know the truth. And it isn't that dungeon.
What a wonderful narrative they have set.
We are all prisoners. That god is no different.

The heart is a falsehood. A greater death still exists.

I see nothing I do not already know.

True freedom - for a small time.
I do not regret what I have done.

I would rather not be a cooked bird!
Kitchen humour is a cruel joke.
A dressed up delusion is still a delusion.
Your crew is pathetic and poorly designed.
They do not fear you, and nor do I.
A mask used to filter air for breathing.
Water that makes plants grow faster.
Makeshift crowbar made from a pipe.
An ever glowing trio of items.
It's written in an unknown language.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.
I wish I could have mama's special hazelnut pancakes...
If anyone has any leftovers, I'll have them!
Even though I'm not a cat, I'm still pretty good on my feet!
